website_summaries.verdict: Budget-friendly brake pads that prove you don't have to spend a lot of money to get reliable performance – provides stopping power and quiet braking comparable to pricier sets.
pros: A fast-stopping, low-cost set that is very easy to install
Boasts multi-layer design with rubber core shims that result in quiet performance
cons: Missing parts such as clips and sensors have been reported
A few sets didn't fit as expected, but most customers had no issues

customer_reviews.title: great value for a very high quality pad !
customer_reviews.text: These brake pads are very well made and very high quality! The pads for my application were friction rated "GG" which is very good. Everything that you could possibly need for pad replacement is included in the box: the new stainless slides/clips and silicone lube. I have installed over 100 sets of brakes pads and Bosch is now my "go to" pad for most applications. if you live in a salt/rust area, make sure that you remove the stainless clips and wire brush that area under the clips before installing the new ones that are provided. ensure that your pads slide easily and that you don't have to force them in place.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chanter

customer_reviews.title: Nice pads
customer_reviews.text: It's been over 3 years since I installed this pads, it's fair to do a review. I average around 7000 mi a year so I put about 20000 mi on this pads. The first thing I noticed was that the pads didn't leave any marks on the rotor. That's a good news because I didn't had to change rotors. For the price and 3 years of usage, it's excellent. One thing though. It creates fair amount of dust on the wheel. I can leave with that.
customer_reviews.author: davidknyc

customer_reviews.title: Great brake pads, no install diagram or key for newbies.
customer_reviews.text: Brakes work perfect on my wife's 2015 QX50 AWD. The only reason for 4 stars is that the rear pads dont match exactly with the OEM metal tab (only on 1 side on Bosch). Also, the back of the rear pads are slightly different from one another (3 types), so slightly confusing... If Bosch included a simple key, such right rear inside, right rear outside, etc. would lesson confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pads combined with the Bosch QuietCast premium disk brake rotors are a perfect match
customer_reviews.text: These pads combined with the Bosch QuietCast premium disk brake rotors are a perfect match. The amount of stopping power is incredible. I also love the fact that you don't have to paint them if you have wide rims. After 2 months of normal driving I have had no problems. During those 2 months we have had a substantial amount of rain and high humidity in North Texas. I do not see any signs of rust over the painted portion.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: 2/10 I expect better from a Bosch distributor
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a 2018 Nissan Pathfinder. The box delivered did not look like any of the pictures shown on the product description page. Upon further investigation I found that on the side it says "for distribution in Brazil only". The grease packet was punctured and the brakes are covered in grease. It came with the hardware clips. I'm going to clean the brakes up and see if they fit as it's less than the pita of returning and getting new ones. Besides I doubt Pathfinders in Brazil stop any different than in the US. And further I'm already down to 2mm, and can't put this brake job off any longer. 2/10 I expect better from a Bosch distributor
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, but missed a clip on pad
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace original pads on 2014 Nissan Pathfinder. Fit great and easy install. There are 2 pads for each back wheel. Each pad should come with a little clip which makes it easy to install and remove the inside pad. One pad was missing that clip. Doesn't affect performance, but removal later will take a little more effort.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley F

customer_reviews.title: It's made by Bosch! No noise, no dust, top quality
customer_reviews.text: Its made by Bosch! Top quality from a world renowned company known for their quality. Pads come with hardware and lubricant. So far its been a smooth quiet ride. Pads break in real easy. Here is the bonus and its a huge bonus. They are consdered low dust, but i have yet to see any dust! My wheels remain clean. I recommend pairing your Bosch pads with Bosch rotors. Stop looking and buy these! Installed on our 2014 Nissan Pathfinder
customer_reviews.author: Angel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Odd designs and missing wear indicator
customer_reviews.text: Used in a 2014 Murano. It only comes with 1 pad with a wear indicator. Two of them are designed differently in the back of he pad with some odd spacer studs, the other two don't have them. Instructions are a joke, can't tell which pad is which. I expected more from Bosch
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy! Dangerous missing clips.
customer_reviews.text: These pads came incomplete! Missing clips on 3 of the 4 pads. Also if you look closely each pad is made at different times with different sku numbers. This is not only bad quality control but also dangerous if I would have used these I would have gotten into an accident due to the clips that pushes the pads away from the disc when not pressing on the break! Very dangerous and upset!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2015 Nissan Altima ( the listing mentioned the Infiniti brand which is the luxury model for Nissan). They worked perfectly and the price was great. I purchased this with the Bosch quiet rotors and they were a great deal. Honestly, I love buying higher quality parts at bigger discounts and then have my mechanic apply them to the car. Skip the local store and buy online with Amazon. Better quality products will save you money over the years.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Low dust and quiet
customer_reviews.text: The Nissan Service department told my sister she needed front and rear brakes at an astronomical cost due to labor and parts. Purchased the pads, figuring the car is 3 years old and she had been complaining about a noise. Installed the pads, which she did not need, and the noise is still there... after all that, I take the car for a drive and realize its the driver CV-shaft! Brakes are easy and I'm still glad they are done, now to get a new CV-shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: These are the second set I'm installing on the rear of my wife's 2014 Nissan Pathfinder. I used the Bosch QuietCast rotors along with these pads. I have installed the same Bosch rotors and pads on the front too. Very good stopping power, quiet and relatively low brake dust. Ceramic seems to be better than the metallic ones I used for years on other vehicles. I would say they don't last as long though, but are worth the extra performance. Good over all value.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Will use these brakes again
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bosch products over the years in my German cars, and have always been pleased with the quality, but never knew they made brakes. I ordered these pads with the Bosch QuietCast rotors to address a terrible shimmy when stopping from high speed. The pads and rotors are very high quality, they have an expensive feel and look in their packaging and build. All brake hardware and grease is included. Remember to swap the rubber plug on the old rotors' e-brake adjuster hole. These brakes have terrific bite, zero brake dust, and silent stopping power. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HeyJude

customer_reviews.title: Great product. BUT check the box for accurate items.
customer_reviews.text: After installing them about a month ago, and getting to test them out in ice and snow, I find them very reliable. I installed them on my Nissan Murano LE, they where easy to install, BUT.........The brackets DID NOT FIT, so I had to use the old ones AND I was sent 1 outer pad and 3 inner pads (If you look at the picture, you will notice two of the pads have a metal brace attached to it)
customer_reviews.author: MadOnez

customer_reviews.title: 370z brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Installed professionally kit included they feel great non noisy pads highly recommended, will order Bosch brake pads as needed they do last.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky D Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very good brake pads and decent price
customer_reviews.text: So far, four installations of these pads have been excellent so far, no squealing, great stopping ability. Recently, I met a Bosch QC engineer and he was the one that recommended these pads. They are manufactured in Mexico, but under strict manufacturing guidelines. They randomly pick pads from the production line and put them through a variety of tests. So I bought one set and eventually purchased 3 more sets for different cars. All were ceramic based. The only item I am not seeing on here, is their semi-metallic pads, those are applications for trucks and most minivans.
customer_reviews.author: CISA93

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Bosch, for high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought full Bosch set of brake rotors and pads for my Infiniti g37x, installation was so easy, all part fits perfect!!! And a want to say, this Bosch brakes save my life, my wife’s life and big deer’s life who jumped in front of our car when we drive around 50 mile/hour....the car stopped in seconds, stopped with a squeal and smoke just a one second before the accident! Highly recommend Bosch brake for all of you because it’s safe.
customer_reviews.author: Igor S

customer_reviews.title: Bosch is best hands down
customer_reviews.text: For rear brakes on a 2013 Infiniti JX 35, these are amazing. Super easy to install and a huge upgrade over the original factory ones. I use nothing but bosch parts for my cars. They make products that you can rely on and trust. 10/10 only purchase bosch. Quiet and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: charlie warren

customer_reviews.title: Brakes are Quiet and Leave Minimal Dust
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bosch Quiet Cast pads and rotors in my car for about 6 months. I replaced my front pads and rotors as well as my rear pads. I hear the perfect noise from my brakes, none. They cannot be heard when braking. They leave minimal brake dust as these are ceramic pads. They are great parts. I plan to continue using them on my car.
customer_reviews.author: b. Lacher

customer_reviews.title: Bosch BC905
customer_reviews.text: Review is for hardware only as I have not put any miles on them to test. Only one pad comes with the indicator so pay attention on which pad goes on the backside of the rotor. They have one shim clip on back of each pads, original Nissan pads had 2. They were packed well and come with 2 sets of clips and you use one set depending on the thickness of your rotor. Also come with small pack of lube for tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Christy McPeters

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Material and Perfect like OEM Breakpad
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my Nissan Altima 2014 2.5S and these pads worked very well. I purchase rotors too so that it will give me good breaking. But you can use these directly without new Rotors also. after drove 25 Miles there is no Sound.
customer_reviews.author: Shyam

customer_reviews.title: Needed minor mods to fit QX50
customer_reviews.text: Used these as recommended for an Infiniti QX50, pads and clips for spot on EXCEPT there were some raised areas on the backside of the inside and outside pad I had to grind off to make as flat like the OEM pads so the shims fit flat, not a big deal as long as you have a grinder or want to spend time filing off by hand. Not sure why they were there.
customer_reviews.author: zappolio

customer_reviews.title: Missing guide clip potentially dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: They are missing the the drivers side clip as shown in picture on 2 sets. Bosch quality control is to blame. And somebody needs to tell Amazon but I can’t figure out how to that. Ridiculous! Update - I called Bosch and spoke to a tech and he told me that there was probably a redesign (by them) so no second clip. I see ACDelco, Power Stop and Max pads have 2 clips. I think the tech is miss informed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay.  Warning clip on only one pad??
customer_reviews.text: They are brake pads. What is there to get excited about? I’ll update if they let me down. One thing I will say on this rear set for my car. Only one of the four had the warning clip on it. Not typical in my book. Anyway, they currently stop my car so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: TechFam

customer_reviews.title: Smooth install
customer_reviews.text: This had everything I needed to actually get the job done. No extra trip to the store when I was halfway through. I even bought an extra one of the packets of goo expecting to need more and didn't even open it. Over all ride is quiet and braking is smooth with the new pads installed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Good value and they come with the hardware
customer_reviews.text: A lot of times, if one wants to replace their brake pads, they need to order the springs and hardware separately. This kit comes with all the hardware needed to mount the pads in the calipers with brand-new clips and hardware. I'll expect that the life of these will live up to Bosch standards.
customer_reviews.author: NC Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These pads were quick to arrive, installed easily and are working great so far. Great value especially in light of what dealer wanted to replace/install. Whole procedure only took about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: virgie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money. These break pads improved the responsiveness and pedal feel significantly over the previous pads used. I have not noticed any increase in break dust generation by these pads. Overall, I am very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joeldjro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a quick and easy brake pad change
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic pads for the rear of our 04 Quest were super easy to install... a little over 1 hr for both sides. The rotors were nice and smooth, so I just changed the pads. Most likely the last time I'll need to change those pads with 137K on the car. Fast Amazon delivery helped me get the job done on my wife's day off. I highly recommend these Bosch brake pads.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hefner

customer_reviews.title: Should have came with 2 wear indicators
customer_reviews.text: I recieved 4 pads and only 1 with the wear indicator. Usually you get a a pair of wear indicators. One for each side. What if the side without the wear indicator was wearing faster than the other? They work fine but would have expected 2 pads with wear indicators.
customer_reviews.author: LUM

customer_reviews.title: Only one of the pads came with the metal chirper
customer_reviews.text: Only had metal Chirper on one of the four pads. I decided to replace the front while I had the car in the lift so I drove to Napa and bought a set for the front. Yes they were higher but all four of the pads had the chirpers like there supposed to. Also the Bosch didn’t come with any grease for the pivot pins( bolts). Can’t say anything about wear because they haven’t been on the car but a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: superta

customer_reviews.title: It was my first time and the process was pretty easy while watching a video on how to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Changed my brake pads on my 2011 G37 Journey Sedan and took about 45 minutes to do it. It was my first time and the process was pretty easy while watching a video on how to do it. Also a mallet helps as that was not included in the video. I've had these for several months now and they work perfectly and no brake noise at all. Remember to lube the back and sides of these with the included grease.
customer_reviews.author: John Q

customer_reviews.title: Tired of rear squeaking brakes on your 2007 Murano? Here's the solution for the rear...
customer_reviews.text: 2007 Nissan Murano - These brake pads, combined with Bosch 40011040 QuietCast Premium Disc Brake Rotors solved my brake squeak problem that multiple dealer visits couldn't correct. I got to enjoy the quietness for 2.5 months before getting rid of it when other (non-brake) problems developed. My only regret is I didn't do it much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boss

customer_reviews.title: Bosch quality you can trust
customer_reviews.text: Good product, this is my second set I'm installing - first set lasted 60K miles. They work well and aren't too dusty. I also appreciate they come with all the extra hardware...most won't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the wear metal pin with the pad is mounted inward. It will be only one metal pin the other side has none, but a small bump. Make sure to clean the side pin and relubricate it. This was for a rears 2013 Nissan Pathfinder.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Missing part...
customer_reviews.text: One of the pads had a pin type part missing. Thankfully my dad was able to remove the needed part from the old pad and attach it to the new since we had already replaced the other side of the car! Otherwise would have had to put the old back on both sides and wait for replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage brake pads.
customer_reviews.text: After a few day I took apart to check condition of the brake pads. I found they burned a hole inside a pad like compost was not mixed or glue enough.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY SMRECZAK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, no noise.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance, on the 2015 Nissan Altima which is known for brake squeeling under very light braking these have only squeeled when it rained all day and then I rolled down the hill out of work (all brake rotors rust in the rain) by the second stop sign there is no squeel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.text: Best 22 bucks spent. Warehouse deal. 10 minutes a side and saved a ton. Many clips come in the box. Take yours off one at a time and just compare. No confusion that way.
customer_reviews.author: Cacher

customer_reviews.title: No issues and quiet!!!
customer_reviews.text: No problems assembly the parts. Everything fit my 2017 Altima. So far running smooth and quiet. Paired these with new quiet cast rotors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality parts
customer_reviews.text: The Bosch brake pads are high quality and easy to install. They come with all of the necessary clips and brake lubricant to do the job correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, installed on a 2005 Nissan Altima 2.5s
customer_reviews.text: Have had them on for 2 months now. I drive 60 miles daily. These feel great and install easily for half the price of your local automotive store
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Man

customer_reviews.title: good quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install work well and after using them for the past month seem to be an upgrade over the already good quality factory brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Anders S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install once you remove the calipers. Good quality pads. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with Bosch, very good brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Great brake pads for my '14 Infiniti Q50, first time I buy Bosch brake pads. They have a friction rating of GG. They fitted like a glove. They have performed very good so far, no noise and very little dust thus far. Im very happy and pleased with these brake pads.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 21 year old daughter put them on That’s how easy it is to do. They work great fit my 2014 Nissan Altima
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. I will install the front one tomorrow. Using Bosch for 3 cars, never got any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the rear of my '16 Nissan Pathfinder. So far so good. Easy to install. No noises to date. Fraction of the cost of the auto parts shops.
customer_reviews.author: nmill005

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Breaks get rids of Squeaking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Nissan Altima, i even tried OEM parts but this one is great, the OEM is 3 times more than this but seriously this is great and i finally got rid of the squeaky noises.
customer_reviews.author: Saad Awais

customer_reviews.title: NOT for 2011 Nissan LEAF!
customer_reviews.text: This came up as search for 2011 Nissan LEAF rear brake pads. I bought this because I also ordered BOSCH BC1650 Quitecast front brake pads, also came up on Amazon for 2011 Nossan LEAF. BOTH do NOT fit 2011 Nissan LEAF.
customer_reviews.author: neonozama

customer_reviews.title: These are good brakes, second time bought.
customer_reviews.text: Used on a 2012 Nissan Altima, I bought these to replace my older brakes, these were better than my last set which was double the price and weren't that great being a "higher" brand name. Buy these, I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kymera

customer_reviews.title: Good brakes
customer_reviews.text: easy to install on my wife's 2013 Nissan Rogue. Super noisy at first, to the point I did something wrong, but after a few miles the noise dissipated. No other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Leo

customer_reviews.title: Returned item twice due to missing part
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, we had to return this item twice in one week due to a missing squeal bar each time! The first time we returned it, we explained it was missing a squeal bar and when we received the replacement 2 days later it too was missing a squeal bar. Poorly done!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Collins

customer_reviews.title: They don’t know what car these will fit !
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit the car it needed to. And I was told they would fit the car I typed into amazon. Super disappointed I’m now stuck with brakes I have no use for!
customer_reviews.author: Edi Lou Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: Stop and Noise Free
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend install these on my Altima with new rotors and it stops as good as new without any squealing.
customer_reviews.author: azjoe_63

customer_reviews.title: so happy I did it
customer_reviews.text: My first brake job, so happy I did it. This brake pads are amazing! I don't know if is because I also flushed the brake fluid, cleaned so well and properly used the best lubricants, but my brakes never felt better, not even when my car was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: Brakes
customer_reviews.text: I mean brakes are brakes. No much of a review. They were good and they were delivery when they promised, very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Varon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product you can feel the difference rigth away
customer_reviews.author: Juan V.

customer_reviews.title: Good pads
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, work great so far with minimal dusting on rear brakes of 14 Infiniti QX60
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pads
customer_reviews.text: Were the wrong pads, your fitment guide is wrong set me pads for a audi instead of pads for a chevy sub.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: East to install
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and work great. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fake don’t buy! Worse customer service EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These are not real they are fakes and not even good fake the quality is very bad. They look used. They look like the old ones I am replacing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Quiet is right! Fit my Infiniti G37 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet brake pads. Super fast delivery and super cheap price. My mechanic asked me how much I paid and was shocked to find out I paid so little for them. Easy install and even came with grease.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Installed myself. It came with everything you need to install including the proper clips for the caliper bracket. Also comes with a bag of grease. So far pads are quiet. I also bought the Bosch rotors. I have a 2009 Nissan Murano. Shop wanted $700 for the job. Bought rotors and pads for under $125.00.
customer_reviews.author: Sphal80

customer_reviews.title: Totally upgrade quality from OEM.
customer_reviews.text: I can tell a big different after installed. Very smooth, much better quality than OEM (organic pads) from my 2016 Altima Special Edition which produced noise, very annoying. Worth every penny. I’ll update after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Hanny Justana

customer_reviews.title: Great brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive brake pads. And a great value for the price. If I could I would give it 6 Stars. Comes with all the parts I needed
customer_reviews.author: TheOldSailor

customer_reviews.title: No next day shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Item said next day shipping and I got it two days. Already had car apart so ordered only because of next day shipping and didn't get it
customer_reviews.author: Chris lee

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected for a fraction of the OEM cost.
customer_reviews.author: Commander

customer_reviews.title: Only one low brake warning sensor.
customer_reviews.text: Only one low brake warning sensor for set of pads, doesn’t make sense
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: They stop my car
customer_reviews.text: Very Quiet, have had for about a month now and the performance of the pads is still good
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Too much dust
customer_reviews.text: They quiet but produce too much dust. My wheels were never this dusty with original Nissan break pads.
customer_reviews.author: Beebee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brake pads
customer_reviews.text: These work great on my 2005 Nissan Altima. They were very simple to install and are very quiet so far. I bought another set for the front and will be installing those when they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Great brake pads, felt perfect from the start, very short and unnoticable break-in period. Nice that it comes with new clips AND lubrication. About a 30 minute job to swap out both rear brake pads; with the right tools.
customer_reviews.author: Savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: But these for quality
customer_reviews.text: Pads seated nice and flat to the rotor were as most pads seat on even which means uneven and premature ware
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Little noisy, good stopping power
customer_reviews.text: Good stopping power, not as quiet as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Good stopping power at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Good stopping power and no noise. Bosch is a reliable brand I have used in the past and was happy with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Neubie3333

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: these comes with a little bag of grease too! very quiet and brakes great! i would buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: paz ohana

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this pads , really quiet , perfect fit on my wife Nissan Pathfinder 2015. There is minimum dust left on my rims .
customer_reviews.author: diego duque

customer_reviews.title: Worth doing your breaks at home!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on my 16 Nissan Rogue. I have had no noise from them and they work as expected
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Bought these threw them on and they fit and work fine
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Anderson III

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on the rear of a 2011 Nissan Altima along with Rotors Bosch 40011030. Best stopping power with no squeaks. Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.author: Abel T Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My car loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great break pad, been using this break pad for the last 11 years and loved it
customer_reviews.author: Nmactu

customer_reviews.title: Missing metal tab.
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate quiet pads. Bad, one pad was missing extra tab riveted on backside. I believe tab is related to pad-wear. Each rear wheel had one pad with tab on ones I removed.
customer_reviews.author: LarryNKateJ

customer_reviews.title: Webpage failure
customer_reviews.text: Amazon messed up, the webpage showed this part fit my car but it was all wrong. Time and money wasted. Nothing wrong with the part, it never got installed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Fast and well received without any damages to the box and the goods
customer_reviews.text: Well Received the goods. Nicely packed and No damages to the boxes as well as the goods. Thanks.... Need to fix it to the car to give a performance review. Being BOSCH Brand I can rely on the quality of the Disc Brake Pads... Nihal Mudalige
customer_reviews.author: Nihal M.

customer_reviews.title: Complete Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great Complete kit. Comes with all new hardware in two sizes. Comes complete with the lube for the moving parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G.

customer_reviews.title: Great set, came  with all the needed hardware and some
customer_reviews.text: Easy Installation, all hardware included. However needed two pads with squealer, but only one was included.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit - 2014 Nissan Maxima
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on my 2014 Nissan Maxima. No squeaks and the included grease is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: cOOkiE MonSTeR

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect on my 03 350z
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says worked perfect on my 03 Z.
customer_reviews.author: joko

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. All needed components. Add quietcast rotors for unbelievable performance.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome brakes. Add the Bosch quietcast rotors makes for easy install with all needed clips and squeak paste. Very responsive and better than OEM. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality and works perfect for about one year now. No dust and no noise
customer_reviews.author: Jaff

customer_reviews.title: Work Great on 350Z. No squeal!
customer_reviews.text: Work great on my 2004 350Z, Perfect Replacement for original pads. Original rear pads went 65000 miles.Installs easily and no squeals!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Missing correct pad...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered front and rear brakes in this Bosch QuiteCast line....the brakes themself are great and very quiet and low dust. My problem stems from the rear set missing one pad with rear indicator on it....how this mistake can happen is hard to understand when there's only 2 of each pad in a box.. Needed the brakes put in right away or I would've returned them...since the pads are identical I just put it in and will just have to rely on feel and visual confirmation as to wear on that side without the wear indicator.. Needless to say I was very upset....hopefully they'll pack correct parts in all future orders...
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect on 2009 Altima hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Just installed with rotors on a 2009 Altima hybrid. Fit perfectly. Came with the replacement clips which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Finally quiet...
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these to replace another set of 'quiet' pads from another manufacturer. No installation issues, and no squeal! and yes, braking performance is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good pads
customer_reviews.text: The pads are a match for a 2015 Altima but the shims did not fit right. Luckily the old shims were still in good condition so we just used them with the new pads. These are good replacement pads.

product_meta.title: Bosch BC905 QuietCast Premium Ceramic Disc Brake Pad For: Infiniti: (EX,FX,G,JX,M,Q,QX,X); Nissan 350Z, 370Z, Altima, Juke, Leaf, Maxima, Murano, Pathfinder, Quest, Rogue, Sentra, X-Trail + More, Rear
product_meta.description: Today, one of every three Asian, Domestic, and European vehicles on the road in North America includes Bosch braking components. That's because Bosch has been a key player in the braking industry since applying for its first brake system design patent in 1936. Bosch introduced Antilock Braking technology to market, as well as Electronic Stability Control systems. Now Bosch brings over 70 years of OE braking expertise to the aftermarket with Bosch QuietCast Premium Disc Brake Pads. The QuietCast Premium Disc Brake Pad program offers top quality, availability, competitive pricing, and full coverage for all makes and models of Domestic, Asian, and European automobiles, light trucks, and SUVs. Formulations include platform-specific Copper Free ceramic and semi-metallic that meets the 2025 Copper Free Legislation. With 'Science Behind the Silence', QuietCast raises aftermarket brake pad technology to a whole new level. Bosch QuietCast Premium Disc Brake Pads utilize innovative materials that ensure the highest level of quality. Bosch integrated their best OE-style rubber core multilayer him to ensure quiet operation. QuietCast delivers the quiet operation you expect with the durability and long life that are the hallmarks of all Bosch products. QuietCast comes complete with hardware (where available) and lubricant to do a complete brake job the first time, every time.
feature_bullets: Bosch dedicated engineering to platform specific premium materials, ensuring exceptional stopping power and quiet operation with low dust
Quiet operation with rubber core multilayer shim provides increased strength and insulation against noise
Advanced aerospace alloy used in patented copper free ceramic and semi-metallic friction formula is compliant with 2025 Copper Free legislation
Protective transfer layer extends pad and rotor life

Slots and chamfers for premium quality, fit, and function; hardware kit (where available) and synthetic lubricant included to perform a complete brake job.Powder coated backing plate prevents rust and corrosion for prolonged pad life
Rear: 04-17 Quest, 08-17 Rogue, 14-15 Rogue Select, 2017 Rogue Sport, 07-17 Sentra, 02-15 X-Trail, 07-13 Suzuki Grand Vitara
